repnme.cdata!:
Argentina - Public Sector Management
            Technical Assistance Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project consists of four
            major components: (a) the development of analytical tools
            and strengthening of the information base for use by the
            Ministry of Economy which includes (i) building practical
            forecasting models; (ii) improving macroeconomic and
            sectoral data; (iii) preparing social indicators and poverty
            impact studies; and (iv) training programs on statistical
            and economic software packages. (b) A central resource
            mobilization and use component to (i) analyze and reinforce
            the public investment cycle; (ii) develop a training program
            for project preparation and appraisal; (iii) strengthen
            budget preparation and control; (iv) improve tax policy and
            strengthen tax administration; and (v) improve criteria and
            methods relating to prices and tariffs. (c) A public sector
            management component to define the relationship of public
            enterprises with the Government to replace day to day
            controls with a system of accountability, improve management
            supervision, and strengthen the institutional aspects of the
            public management efforts. (d) An industry and trade
            component to simplify trade and customs procedures, improve
            information for exporters, and strengthen the design of
            export promotion policies.
